name: Invisible Plattformer
description:
This is a small Plattformer made for the WeeklyGameJam #147.
In this game you play as a small chunk of dirt defeating the roboters while progressing through the level.
But there is one twist. While your first playthrough of the Level, you should pay attention to how the level is setup, because the second level ist build the same but with some Parts beeing Invisible. You can walk on these Parts, but you can't see them.

So, that's get to my challange to you:
Get to Level 6 and complete this level as fast as possible.
Try to beat my time of 4 minutes and 20 seconds. Good Luck and have fun with this game.

PS: If you beat my time, write your time in the comments, so other people can try to beat you.
